title: Debian packaging update for 0.12

milestone.title: Release 0.12.0
milestone.description:
- drop support of direct mode
- potentially bring revolution home fully or in parts

body:
@yarikoptic here is the start of the Debian packaging update.

This sits on top of #3993

- [x] Refreshed patch series
- [x] Adjusted gbp setup to work without pristine-tar
- [x] Tests pass on a real box with a really dirty env
- [x] Test pass in a Debian package only cluster environment
- [x] Address #3944 (not sure if recommends or build-dep)

Build can be made with a plain `gbp buildpackage` in the root of the repository clone (`debian` branch).

Lintian report:

```
W: python3-datalad: embedded-javascript-library usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/resources/website/assets/js/jquery-2.2.4.js please use libjs-jquery
W: datalad: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry usr/share/man/man1/datalad-add-archive-content.1.gz
W: datalad: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry usr/share/man/man1/datalad-add-readme.1.gz
W: datalad: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry usr/share/man/man1/datalad-add.1.gz
W: datalad: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry ... use --no-tag-display-limit to see all (or pipe to a file/program)
W: datalad: manpage-has-errors-from-man usr/share/man/man1/datalad-aggregate-metadata.1.gz 35: warning: macro 'datalad.metadata.nativetype'' not defined (possibly missing space after 'da')
W: datalad: manpage-has-errors-from-man usr/share/man/man1/datalad-run-procedure.1.gz 40: a special character is not allowed in a name
W: datalad: manpage-has-errors-from-man usr/share/man/man1/datalad-siblings.1.gz 14: warning: macro 'configure',' not defined
W: datalad: manpage-has-errors-from-man ... use --no-tag-display-limit to see all (or pipe to a file/program)
W: datalad source: patch-file-present-but-not-mentioned-in-series bionic-dsc-patch
W: datalad source: patch-file-present-but-not-mentioned-in-series buster-dsc-patch
W: datalad source: patch-file-present-but-not-mentioned-in-series cosmic-dsc-patch
W: datalad source: patch-file-present-but-not-mentioned-in-series ... use --no-tag-display-limit to see all (or pipe to a file/program)
N: 3 tags overridden (1 error, 2 warnings)
```
